thread.title: Man Utd transfer news: Alex Timossi Andersson confirms trial with Red Devils | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd transfer news: Alex Timossi Andersson confirms trial with Red Devils | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd transfer news: Alex Timossi Andersson confirms trial with Red Devils | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 7:03 pm Jose Mourinho’s Man United have handed Alex Timossi Andersson a trial (Picture: Getty) 
Alex Timossi Andersson has confirmed that he’s fulfilling a ‘dream’ after Manchester United handed him a trial this week. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The promising 16-year-old forward is currently with Swedish outfit Helsingborgs but is on the radar of a number of top European clubs. 
Andersson, who trained with Bundesliga giants Bayern Munich earlier this season, is actually scheduled to take part in a match for United on Friday, according to Manchester Evening News . 
‘It is of course great that you can go to the team that you have dreamed about since you were little,’ the Swedish teenager told Expressen. A post shared by Alex Timossi Andersson (@alextimossi) on Nov 8, 2016 at 11:19am PST 
‘I may not be as nervous as last time [at Bayern]. Now I have a little known of how it is to be in a big club again. Then one is a little easier. 
‘I’ll do as well as I can, then we will see.’
